DOC.detailed_description: A 6 week randomize , double blind placebo control trial healthy young adult age 18 50 . Participants administer oral dose B. subtilis placebo ( 1 capsule/day ) period 4 week . Viable count measure stool sample assess transit survival , daily questionnaire ( DQ ) administer assess general wellness , gastrointestinal ( GI ) symptom evaluate three time Gastrointestinal Symptom Response Scale ( GSRS ) questionnaire .
